text: David Outlaw was a politician, congressman and slaveholder who represented North Carolina in Congress as a Whig in the period before the Civil War. He was born in 1806, and died aged sixty-two in 1868. == References == Category:1806 births Category:1868 deaths Category:19th-century American politicians Category:Lawyers from North Carolina Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Whig Party (United States) politicians
title: David Outlaw
